about_the_game:
➡️SUBSCRIBE TO OUR MAILING LIST ON OUR WEBSITE TO GET THE GAME'S ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK! 📩



The main goal: Grow your farm, manage it and live your life peacefully amongst your animals. Be the best selling farmer and earn cash by selling your goods!

First: Start your new farm life and get ready for the management!



Buy your first seeds by talking to the shopkeepers and plant them one by one! They will start to grow. Note: Each seed type has unique stats, so consider which one you're planting!



Consider upgrading your farm by purchasing more land. Rent barns for storage and horse capacity, buy animal pens for animals, and there are houses and cabins what you can furnish, and relax in somewhen.



Purchase animals, harvest your plants, and collect goods such as milk, wool, and eggs. Once that is done, congrats! You are now able to use the market.



Put the goods and gathered resources up on the market, your customers are waiting! Consider which product you offer, each has unique selling price and stats.



Build your own house and barn, and don't forget to furnish it! Make it cozy.



💬Got any questions? Contact us on our 'Forum site'!
detailed_description:
➡️SUBSCRIBE TO OUR MAILING LIST ON OUR WEBSITE TO GET THE GAME'S ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK! 📩



The main goal: Grow your farm, manage it and live your life peacefully amongst your animals. Be the best selling farmer and earn cash by selling your goods!

First: Start your new farm life and get ready for the management!



Buy your first seeds by talking to the shopkeepers and plant them one by one! They will start to grow. Note: Each seed type has unique stats, so consider which one you're planting!



Consider upgrading your farm by purchasing more land. Rent barns for storage and horse capacity, buy animal pens for animals, and there are houses and cabins what you can furnish, and relax in somewhen.



Purchase animals, harvest your plants, and collect goods such as milk, wool, and eggs. Once that is done, congrats! You are now able to use the market.



Put the goods and gathered resources up on the market, your customers are waiting! Consider which product you offer, each has unique selling price and stats.



Build your own house and barn, and don't forget to furnish it! Make it cozy.



💬Got any questions? Contact us on our 'Forum site'!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

name: Farmieland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 730

short_description: 🍅Start your farm fresh⬆️Upgrade🏪Purchase from the market🔓Unlock NEW🌱Seeds and🐄Animals 🤑Get rich by trading and selling products🔨Build your farm🏠Furnish your home💪Live your farm life and take care of your land🍕Feed your animals🐎Ride your own horse 🏅Unlock achievements ❤️
